languages.text: "В твоем профиле указано, что на тебе лежит печать колдовства... впрочем, колдовства санкционированного, дозволенного к служению Империуму. Я привычна к присутствию рядом со мной {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}псайкеров{/g} — более того, я весьма ценю их уникальные способности. Возможно, поэтому я так заинтригована в кандидатуре Эдельтрада — колдун-Вольный Торговец может стать по настоящему великим. Однако псайкеры хрупки — и лучше у меня будет замена, если с Эделем что-то произойдет".

traits.locale_text: "В твоем профиле указано, что на тебе лежит печать колдовства... впрочем, колдовства санкционированного, дозволенного к служению Империуму. Я привычна к присутствию рядом со мной {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}псайкеров{/g} — более того, я весьма ценю их уникальные способности. Возможно, поэтому я так заинтригована в кандидатуре Эдельтрада — колдун-Вольный Торговец может стать по настоящему великим. Однако псайкеры хрупки — и лучше у меня будет замена, если с Эделем что-то произойдет".

languages.text: "It says in your profile that you bear the brand of sorcery... albeit sanctioned sorcery that is permitted in the service of the Imperium. I am accustomed to the presence of {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psykers{/g} at my side. More than that, I value their unique abilities highly. Perhaps that is why I am so intrigued by Edelthrad's candidacy — a Rogue Trader psyker could achieve great things indeed. However, psykers are fragile creatures, and as such I would rather have a replacement standing ready in the event that something happens to Edelthrad."
languages.original_text: "В твоем профиле указано, что на тебе лежит печать колдовства... впрочем, колдовства санкционированного, дозволенного к служению Империуму. Я привычна к присутствию рядом со мной {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}псайкеров{/g} — более того, я весьма ценю их уникальные способности. Однако псайкеры хрупки — и лучше у меня будет замена, если с Эделем что-то произойдет".

traits.locale_text: "It says in your profile that you bear the brand of sorcery... albeit sanctioned sorcery that is permitted in the service of the Imperium. I am accustomed to the presence of {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psykers{/g} at my side. More than that, I value their unique abilities highly. Perhaps that is why I am so intrigued by Edelthrad's candidacy — a Rogue Trader sorcerer could achieve great things indeed. However, psykers are fragile things, and as such I would rather have a replacement prepared in the event that something happens to Edelthrad."

languages.text: “资料中说，你的身上带有巫术的印记……不过，你是得到授权的{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}灵能者{/g}，可以为帝国服务。我已经习惯了带着灵能者同行，不仅如此，我也非常重视他们独特的能力。或许这就是为什么我会对艾德萨德这么感兴趣，拥有灵能力量的行商浪人确实可以取得相当伟大的成就。不过，灵能者非常脆弱，因此我很愿意准备一位备选人员。万一艾德萨德发生了什么意外，也能有人接班。”
languages.original_text: "It says in your profile that you bear the brand of sorcery... albeit sanctioned sorcery that is permitted in the service of the Imperium. I am accustomed to the presence of {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psykers{/g} at my side. More than that, I value their unique abilities highly. Perhaps that is why I am so intrigued by Edelthrad's candidacy — a Rogue Trader psyker could achieve great things indeed. However, psykers are fragile creatures, and as such I would rather have a replacement standing ready in the event that something happens to Edelthrad."

traits.locale_text: “资料中说，你的身上带有巫术的印记……不过，你是得到授权的{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}灵能者{/g}，可以为帝国服务。我已经习惯了带着灵能者同行，不仅如此，我也非常重视他们独特的能力。或许这就是为什么我会对艾德萨德这么感兴趣，拥有灵能力量的行商浪人确实可以取得相当伟大的成就。不过，灵能者非常脆弱，因此我很愿意准备一位备选人员。万一艾德萨德发生了什么意外，也能有人接班。”

languages.text: «Según tu perfil, llevas la marca de la hechicería... aunque sea hechicería autorizada, permitida al servicio del Imperium. Estoy acostumbrada a la presencia de los{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psíquicos{/g}. Es más, valoro mucho sus singulares habilidades. Tal vez sea por eso que valoro tanto la candidatura de Edelthrad. Un Comerciante Independiente psíquico podría hacer cosas espectaculares. Sin embargo, los psíquicos son frágiles y por lo tanto me gustaría tener un repuesto por si algo le pasara a Edelthrad».
languages.original_text: "It says in your profile that you bear the brand of sorcery... albeit sanctioned sorcery that is permitted in the service of the Imperium. I am accustomed to the presence of {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psykers{/g} at my side. More than that, I value their unique abilities highly. Perhaps that is why I am so intrigued by Edelthrad's candidacy — a Rogue Trader psyker could achieve great things indeed. However, psykers are fragile creatures, and as such I would rather have a replacement standing ready in the event that something happens to Edelthrad."

traits.locale_text: «Según tu perfil, llevas la marca de la hechicería... aunque sea hechicería autorizada, permitida al servicio del Imperium. Estoy acostumbrada a la presencia de los{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psíquicos{/g}. Es más, valoro mucho sus singulares habilidades. Tal vez sea por eso que valoro tanto la candidatura de Edelthrad. Un hechicero Comerciante Independiente podría hacer cosas espectaculares. Sin embargo, los psíquicos son frágiles y por lo tanto me gustaría tener un repuesto por si algo le pasara a Edelthrad».

languages.text: 「プロフィールによれば、あなたは魔術の烙印を押されているそうだ…とはいえ、それは帝国の奉仕で許可されている認可された魔術でしょう。私は{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}異能者{/g}が身近にいることには慣れている。それ以上に、彼らの特異な能力を高く評価している。おそらくそれが、私がエデルスラドの立候補に非常に興味をそそられる理由だ。自由開拓者の異能者は確かに偉大なことを成し遂げることができるでしょう。しかし、異能者は壊れやすい生き物なので、エデルスラドに何かが起こった場合に備えて代わりの者を用意しておきたい」
languages.original_text: "It says in your profile that you bear the brand of sorcery... albeit sanctioned sorcery that is permitted in the service of the Imperium. I am accustomed to the presence of {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psykers{/g} at my side. More than that, I value their unique abilities highly. Perhaps that is why I am so intrigued by Edelthrad's candidacy — a Rogue Trader psyker could achieve great things indeed. However, psykers are fragile creatures, and as such I would rather have a replacement standing ready in the event that something happens to Edelthrad."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたのプロフィールには、あなたが魔術のブランドを背負っていると書かれています…とはいえ、帝国の奉仕で許可されている認可された魔術でしょう。私は{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}異能者{/g}が身近にいることには慣れています。それ以上に、彼らの特異な能力を評価しています。おそらくそれが、私がエデルスラドの立候補に非常に興味をそそられる理由です…ローグトレーダーのソーサラーは確かに偉大なことを成し遂げることができるでしょう。しかし、異能者は壊れやすい生き物なので、エデルスラドに何かが起こった場合に備えて代わりの者を用意しておきたいと思います」

「プロフィールによれば、あなたは魔術の烙印を押されているそうだ…とはいえ、それは帝国の奉仕で許可されている認可された魔術でしょう。私は{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}異能者{/g}が身近にいることには慣れている。それ以上に、彼らの特異な能力を高く評価している。おそらくそれが、私がエデルスラドの立候補に非常に興味をそそられる理由だ。自由開拓者の異能者は確かに偉大なことを成し遂げることができるでしょう。しかし、異能者は壊れやすい生き物なので、エデルスラドに何かが起こった場合に備えて代わりの者を用意しておきたい」

languages.text: « Il est mentionné dans votre profil que vous portez la marque de sorcellerie... une sorcellerie dûment autorisée au service de l'Imperium, bien entendu. Je suis habituée à la présence de {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psykers{/g} dans mon entourage. De surcroît, j'accorde une grande importance à leurs capacités uniques. C'est peut-être la raison pour laquelle la candidature d'Edelthrad m'intrigue autant... Un psyker libre-marchand pourrait accomplir de grandes choses. Cela dit, les psykers sont des créatures fragiles ; j'aimerais donc avoir un remplaçant à disposition s'il arrivait quelque chose à Edelthrad. »
languages.original_text: "It says in your profile that you bear the brand of sorcery... albeit sanctioned sorcery that is permitted in the service of the Imperium. I am accustomed to the presence of {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psykers{/g} at my side. More than that, I value their unique abilities highly. Perhaps that is why I am so intrigued by Edelthrad's candidacy — a Rogue Trader psyker could achieve great things indeed. However, psykers are fragile creatures, and as such I would rather have a replacement standing ready in the event that something happens to Edelthrad."

traits.locale_text: « Il est mentionné dans votre profil que vous portez la marque de sorcellerie... une sorcellerie dûment autorisée au service de l'Imperium, bien entendu. Je suis habituée à la présence de {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psykers{/g} dans mon entourage. Je dirai même plus que j'accorde une grande importance à leurs capacités uniques. C'est peut-être la raison pour laquelle la candidature d'Edelthrad m'intrigue autant... Un sorcier libre-marchand pourrait accomplir de grandes choses. Cela dit, les psykers sont des créatures fragiles ; j'aimerais donc avoir un remplaçant à disposition s'il arrivait quelque chose à Edelthrad. »

languages.text: "In Eurem Profil steht, dass Ihr das Mal der Hexerei tragt ... allerdings sanktioniert und damit in Diensten des Imperiums erlaubt. Ich bin an die Anwesenheit von {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}Psionikern{/g} an meiner Seite gewöhnt. Und mehr noch, ich schätze ihre einzigartigen Fähigkeiten sehr. Vielleicht fasziniert mich Edelthrads Kandidatur deshalb so sehr – ein Freihändler-Psioniker könnte in der Tat Großes bewirken. Andererseits sind Psioniker empfindliche Wesen, und darum hätte ich gerne einen Ersatz für den Fall, dass Edelthrad etwas zustößt."
languages.original_text: "It says in your profile that you bear the brand of sorcery... albeit sanctioned sorcery that is permitted in the service of the Imperium. I am accustomed to the presence of {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psykers{/g} at my side. More than that, I value their unique abilities highly. Perhaps that is why I am so intrigued by Edelthrad's candidacy — a Rogue Trader psyker could achieve great things indeed. However, psykers are fragile creatures, and as such I would rather have a replacement standing ready in the event that something happens to Edelthrad."

traits.locale_text: "In Eurem Profil steht, dass Ihr das Mal der Hexerei tragt ... allerdings sanktioniert und damit in Diensten des Imperiums erlaubt. Ich bin an die Anwesenheit von {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}Psionikern{/g} an meiner Seite gewöhnt. Und mehr noch, ich schätze ihre einzigartigen Fähigkeiten sehr. Vielleicht fasziniert mich Edelthrads Kandidatur deshalb so sehr – ein Freihändler-Hexer könnte in der Tat Großes bewirken. Andererseits sind Psioniker empfindliche Wesen, und darum hätte ich gerne einen Ersatz für den Fall, dass Edelthrad etwas zustößt."

languages.text: "Profilinde sahirlik damgası taşıdığın yazıyor. Gerçi İmparatorluk'un hizmetine adanmış onaylı sahirlik bu. Yanımda {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}ruhsezerlerin{/g} bulunmasına alışkınım. Sahip oldukları eşsiz yeteneklere de çok kıymet veririm. Belki de Edelthrad'ın adaylığının bu kadar ilgimi çekmesi bundandır. Ruhsezer bir Hür Tacir büyük işler başarabilir. Ancak ruhsezerler kırılgan yaratıklar. Bu yüzden Edelthrad'ın başına bir şey gelmesi durumunda hazırda bekleyen bir yedeğinin olması tercihim."
languages.original_text: "It says in your profile that you bear the brand of sorcery... albeit sanctioned sorcery that is permitted in the service of the Imperium. I am accustomed to the presence of {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psykers{/g} at my side. More than that, I value their unique abilities highly. Perhaps that is why I am so intrigued by Edelthrad's candidacy — a Rogue Trader psyker could achieve great things indeed. However, psykers are fragile creatures, and as such I would rather have a replacement standing ready in the event that something happens to Edelthrad."

I am accustomed to the presence of psykers at my side. More than that, I value their unique abilities highly. Perhaps that is why I am so intrigued by Edelthrad's candidacy — a Rogue Trader psyker could achieve great things indeed. However, psykers are fragile creatures, and as such I would rather have a replacement standing ready in the event that something happens to Edelthrad."
